lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 11 (U.P) -- Military spokesmen intimated tonight that German and Finnish troops had undertaken a far northern drive from the Salla area, ninety miles from the northwest corner of the White Sea, in an attempt to cut Russia's communications with the port of Murmansk and the whole Kola Peninsula.
abstract: drive from Salla to cut USSR Murmansk communications hinted
